markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4903) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 162 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Twin Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=4831)

</column>

---

At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to perform a Twin Riposte. You can use this extra reaction even if you are not benefiting from Twin Parry.
name: Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger)
